ctaReadyToDrive: Are you ready to drive in Europe?

userSigns.title: Road signs you've taken so far
userSigns.empty: You have not uploaded any traffic signs yet.

delete.title: Delete Image
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this image?

question.submitConfirm: Are you sure you want to submit the quiz?

result.pass:
Congratulations, be careful driving in Europe!
@:result.score
result.fail:
You need to practice more before driving in Europe!
@:result.score

error.failToTakePicture: Failed to take picture. Close the app and try again.

message.zero: You can upload {limit} images today. Every 24 hours, this number will reset.
message.one: You can upload {limit} more image today. You will get one additional image to upload in {hoursLeft} hours.
message.other: You have reached your daily limit. Please wait {hoursLeft} hours before you can upload new image again.

generic.title: Error Reading Traffic Sign
generic.message: The image you provided could neither be uploaded nor read by our system.

imageLimit.title: Daily Image Limit Reached
imageLimit.message: You have reached the maximum daily number of images you can upload. Please try again later.

noTrafficSign.title: No Traffic Sign Detected
noTrafficSign.message: The image you provided does not contain a traffic sign. Please try again. Make sure traffic signs are clearly visible.

uploadImage.title: Error Uploading Image
uploadImage.message: The image you provided could not be uploaded. Please try again.

noExplanationLanguage.title: No Explanation Language
noExplanationLanguage.message:
It seems like you've chosen {} as your language when generating the explanation.
Do you want to switch to that?

ads.caption: Watch ads to be able to upload more images!
